    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll need to settle your Hong Kong dollar (HKD) and renminbi (RMB) account balances separately. If you overpay on one account, it won't be credit to the other account.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you repay your RMB account in Hong Kong dollars, we'll convert the payment amount to renminbi at the prevailing exchange rate, as determined by us, on the payment processing date. Due to exchange rate fluctuations, we recommend that you ensure you have enough funds available to make the repayment. Otherwise, you may incur finance and/or other charges.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_4" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="247968820__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="247968820__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What are 'Assist Services'? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="247968820__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_16">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_27" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_7" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">'Assist Services' refer to our overseas medical, travel assist and concierge services:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Emergency medical assistance can provide you with medical advice over the phone, refer you to clinics or hospitals, and arrange hospital admission upon request. If needed, it can also arrange for your family to visit you or transfer you to a centre of medical excellence.<br> </li> 
 <li>Emergency travel assistance can refer you to the appropriate authorities if you lose your luggage, passport or credit cards while travelling. In an emergency, it can also assist you in booking flights or hotels, interpreting or sending messages to your family. </li> 
 <li>Concierge service can recommend restaurants to you, and help you make restaurant, hotel and flight reservations. It can also assist you in delivering flowers and gifts to your family and friends.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

    
    <div class="anchor" id="list-of-assist-services"></div>


<h4 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="pp_main_heading_12">
    List of assist services
</h4>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>International Medical Assistance:</strong><br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Telephone Medical Advice</li> 
 <li>Medical Service Provider Referral</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of Hospital Admissions</li> 
 <li>Guarantee of Medical Expenses During Hospitalization</li> 
 <li>Medical Interpreter</li> 
 <li>Dispatch of Essential Medicine</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of Emergency Medical Evacuation</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of Emergency Medical Repatriation</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of Repatriation of Mortal Remains</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of Compassionate Visit</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of Return of Minor Children</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of Accommodation</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>China VIP Healthcare Assistance</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Hospital/Clinic referral</li> 
 <li>Triage Assistance</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of specialist appointment</li> 
 <li>Arrangement of VIP outpatient services</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>International Travel Assistance</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Lost Luggage Assistance</li> 
 <li>Lost Passport Assistance</li> 
 <li>Lost/Stolen Cards Reporting</li> 
 <li>Legal Referral Assistance</li> 
 <li>Emergency Travel Service Assistance</li> 
 <li>Emergency Interpreting Assistance</li> 
 <li>Embassy Referral Assistance</li> 
 <li>Emergency Message Transmission</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Concierge</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Shopping<br> - Flower and Gift Delivery Assistance</li> 
 <li>Travel<br> - Pre-trip inoculation and visa requirement information<br> - Hotel referral and reservation assistance<br> - Flight information and ticketing assistance</li> 
 <li>Entertainment<br> - Golf course referral and reservation assistance<br> - Global concert and performance assistance<br> - Global sports events assistance<br> - Dining referral and reservation assistance</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For details or to make arrangements through Assist Services, please call <a href="tel:+852-2169-0108" class="no-link" role="presentation">2169 0108</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

</div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_5" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-1"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-421522351__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-421522351__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What supporting documents do I need to provide in my credit card application? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-421522351__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_17">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_28" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're an existing HSBC customer who holds a payroll account with us and an HKID card, you won't need to provide any supporting documents.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you would like to set up a payroll account before applying for a credit card with us, you can do so by completing an <u><a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/one/setting-up-transfer-of-salary-autopay.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">instruction form for setting up / transfer of salary autopay (PDF)</span><span class="visuallyhidden">instruction form for setting up / transfer of salary autopay (PDF)  This link will open in a new window</span></a></u>.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Other customers will need to provide:</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>a copy of their HKID cardif you do not hold one, please provide a copy of your passport and employment contract with a contract period of at least 9 months from the date of submitting your application</li> 
 <li>proof of income or assetsdepending on your income situation:</li> 
</ol> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><strong>regular income earners</strong>: your latest 1-month bank book / statement / eStatement / online transaction history (showing your name, account number and monthly income) or latest 1-month salary slip</li> 
 <li><strong>irregular income earners or part-timers</strong>: your latest bank book / statement / eStatement / online transaction history (showing your name, account number and monthly income) or salary slips from over the last 3 months</li> 
 <li><strong>self-employed</strong>: your latest tax demand note or latest 3-month bank book / statement / eStatement / online transaction history (showing the company name, account number and transaction history), current Business Registration Certificate, proof of ownership of the business and tax returns from the previous 2 years</li> 
 <li><strong>other</strong>: your latest 3-month bank deposit / bank book / statement / eStatement / online transaction history in Hong Kong (showing your name, account number and transaction history), or regularly monthly rental income credited to your bank account and the signed tenancy agreement</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p><strong>Finance charges</strong></p>
<p>If you do not pay the total outstanding amount due on your credit card by the payment due date, we'll charge this fee to your card. You can see the full details of how this fee is calculated in our <a href="/fees/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">guide to general banking tariffs</span><span class="visuallyhidden">guide to general banking tariffs  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p><strong>Late charges</strong></p>
<p>If we do not receive the minimum payment due on or before the payment due date, we'll charge this fee to your credit card. You can see the full details of how this fee is calculated in the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/credit-cards/2023-Jan-15-credit-card-terms-and-conditions.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span aria-hidden="true">HSBC Credit Card Terms (PDF)</span><span class="visuallyhidden">HSBC Credit Card Terms (PDF)  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
<p></p>
</div></div>
